entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • 0x80070005 #25109
  • Documented VisualStateManager Button/Entry examples throws an exception #25069
  • [MISSING DEPRECATION] Non-firing function overrides like OnMeasure and OnAppearing should be marked as deprecated #21543
    Backlog

Updated

  • [net9.0] Blazor MAUI App hangs during back navigation because of disconnect code #24407
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Grouped CollectionView lazy loading does not trigger [RemainingItemsThresholdReached] on iOS and Windows #10078
    Backlog
  • Fonts/images/assets in a custom MAUI NuGet package not found #19804
    Backlog
  • [WinUI] CollectionView has default native PointerOver state which cannot be removed #13197
    Backlog
  • Fail to compile MAUI Blazor Android only in Release build when there is a file starting with dot (.) in wwwroot folder #22882

PullRequests

Created

  • Move all Bugzilla tests to subfolder #25111
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [iOS] Changed UIImageRenderingMode for buttons #25107
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-button

Updated

  • Adding tests (disabled) from Control Gallery to Appium #24944
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • First tests (disabled) from Control Gallery to Appium #24943
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Remove excessive DataTemplateSelector API comments #25105
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
